role.argrole: thing in the middle of which arg1 is broadcasted

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 只)) (VP (VV 听) (QP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-114 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (LCP-SBJ (NP (NP-PN (NR 警广)) (NP (NN 路况) (NN 报导))) (LC 中)) (VP (VV 插播) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-114)))) (DEC 的))) (IP-APP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 寻找) (NP-OBJ (NN 失物)))) (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 节)))))))
